definition: to help the poor
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
poor/inadequate/deficient/garrulous
to rob the rich to help the poor
robbing the rich to help the poor
to rob the rich to help the poor (idiom)

sentences.english: And the workhouses, where poor people can live and work?
sentences.chinese: 還有可供窮人生活和工作的濟貧院呢？

sentences.english: Redistributing wealth from the rich to the poor only reduces the wealth of both groups, but particularly of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 而劫富濟貧會使雙方的財富都減少，特別是窮人。

sentences.english: I was certain I was on the brink of poverty, going to the poorhouse.
sentences.chinese: 我確信自己已處在貧困的邊緣，馬上就要進濟貧院了。

sentences.english: He helped the poor and rescued those in danger. He enjoyed doing good, and in particular, he never liked to kill anything.
sentences.chinese: 他濟貧並救人於危難，喜歡行善，特別是從不殺生。

sentences.english: Back in the workhouse this would never have happened.
sentences.chinese: 在濟貧院裏是從來不會發生這種事的。

sentences.english: They have offered food and clothes for the relief of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他們捐助食物和衣服救濟貧民。

sentences.english: You're going to the Casterbridge workhouse?
sentences.chinese: 你是要去卡斯特橋濟貧院嗎？

sentences.english: The snow melts before its door as early in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天濟貧院門前的積雪也一樣會早早融化。

sentences.english: 'Did you hear that, Workhouse?' shouted Noah.
sentences.chinese: “你聽見了嗎，濟貧院？”諾厄嚷嚷道。

sentences.english: We contributed food and clothing to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 我們捐助了食物和衣物救濟貧民。

sentences.english: In their minds, is the Robin Hood-like bandit hero.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的頭腦裏，強盜就是劫富濟貧的英雄好漢。

sentences.english: We contributed clothing to the relief of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 我們捐贈衣物救濟貧民。

sentences.english: The beggar at last resorted to the workhouse.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這個乞丐常去濟貧院。

sentences.english: In their eyes, the robber is maxi-cans good example.
sentences.chinese: 在他們眼裏，強盜就是劫富濟貧的好榜樣。

sentences.english: And why would Robin Hood want to rob them to help the poor?
sentences.chinese: 又是爲什麼羅賓漢要劫富濟貧呢？

definition: to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
to stuff one's pockets/to take bribes
neighborly relations
to give relief aid
political relations
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
kind and charitable
sacrificial offerings/worship/religious rite
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
to establish schools/to raise the standard of education
tax liability
selfless/impartial
to award a prize
to be chivalrous
Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
tax/levy/duty/impost
